reviews.review: Я довольно долго играю в портал и мне жаль тех кто ещё не оценил её
纪念一下终于有个朋友和我一起打通了这个游戏！
Es una gran secuela del iconico juego "Portal" con nuevas mecanicas y muy buen juego, se los recomiendo.

Amazing game, fun to play, excellent dialog and story.

A Timeless title, will revisit again and again.

One really good and well made game also a classic too! It is significantly longer than Portal, with more challenging puzzles and a ton of new puzzle mechanics, also the story is really good. If you are thinking on buying this game I recommend playing Portal first to understand the story. Overall this is a masterpiece of a game!
One of the best game ever created
很好，空间想象力不好的玩起来会吃力

Без лишних слов скажу, что это одна из ЛУЧШИХ игр в мире. В ней прекрасно всё: юмор, саундтрек, геймплей, графика, сюжет (мне он показался простым, но это не мешает впечатлениям, тем более здесь показано много человеческих ценностей, таких как дружба, любовь, сострадание). Однозначно рекомендую всем и во все времена!

10/10 

Pros:
>It's Portal 
>Expands on the pre-existing story really well 
>Fkn amazing characters
>Introduces more variety in gameplay with gels 
>Banger multiplayer
>Jam packed w community features which add so much to play time. Explore community maps, make your own maps, heck yeah!

Cons: 
Couldn't think of any.
najpierw jedna facetka chce cię zabić a to wszystko przez jednego debila klasowego
До этой игры я ненавидел гейба из-за кс. После этой игры я назвал сына гейбом

Portal 2 oynarken keyif alacağınız beyinninizin gerçekten zorlanacağı seviyelerle karsılasacaksınız 4 boyutu kavrayacak ve zaman zaman seviyelerin nasıl geçildiği hakkında videolar izliceksiniz ama düşünerek geçemiyeceğiniz bir seviye yok. Teşekkürler VALVe Half-Life kadar iyi bir iş olmasa Valve'ın Half-Life'dan sonraki en iyi oyunların başında gelir Portal 2

A novel idea, perfectly executed. 
Awesome characters, masterfully voice acted.
Oozing with atmosphere: mystery and humor.
Amazing replay value and co-op.

Only two negatives I can think of and neither of them count:
1. Sometimes I wish I could sprint. But that would be less time in a beautiful game and would probably break some puzzles.
2. The campaign ends and it makes me sad.
THIS GAME IS THE BEST GAME IN HISTORY

经典游戏
这一代如同上一代的片尾曲，我仍然活着
Classic game
it‘s same as Portal 1  ending song，I still alive
How do you not have this game already
The game is a pretty long game (6 to 10 hours) for the normal person, you can make your own levels and if you want you can learn hammer to make more detailed courses, also there is a coop mode

It is a great game, even better than Portal 1.

A one of a kind (well um... two of a kind i guess) game. fantastic, funny, puzzle and platformer. old friends and new enemies, and Chell is hot. Fantastic voice acting too. you cant go wrong. if you havent played this by now, buy and beat portal 1, then buy and beat portal 2. its a blast. great co-op mode too. THE ONLY BAD THING about this game is that the puzzles start to get a little old and stale towards the end of the game. but seriously play this game you'll thank yourself. seriously. go.
This is one of the Greatest Games. Ever. Of all time.
Portal muy mejorado pero igual de increible :D
Just finished the campaign for the first time ever and it's fucking amazing, some places are a bit of a headache but otherwise it's amazing.

Jogo maravilhoso. É um puzzle mt criativo e bem feito. Com ótimas fases e muitas mecânicas divertidas.
Tem mt fala dos personagens mas a história é boa tbm
Mega coole story und nice möglichkeit mal was neues auszuprobieren. kauf das spiel aber nicht einzeln sondern im bundle mit portal 1. sonst fehlt dir der storyanfang bzw. zusammenhang.
I loved this game! I played it all day with my friends. I 100% recommend it. But I recommend playing co-op with your friends. Trust me, it helps

This game is an absolutely awesome puzzler.  Hands down my favorite co-op puzzler.  Multitudes of player created levels provides an endless reason to return to playing, even if you take a long break.  The devs keep releasing patches and fixes for issues as they arise.
